Biostatistics

Biostatistics Research

Leveraging statistical methods to advance medical research and improve patient outcomes

Research Focus

My biostatistics work focuses on developing and applying advanced statistical methods to medical and public health research questions. I specialize in survival analysis, longitudinal data analysis, and predictive modeling for clinical outcomes.

Survival Analysis

Developing novel approaches to time-to-event data analysis with applications in clinical trials and observational studies.

Learn more →

Cardiology Research

Statistical modeling of cardiovascular outcomes and risk factors to improve treatment strategies and prevention.

Learn more →

Clinical Trials

Design and analysis of clinical trials, including sample size calculation, interim analyses, and adaptive designs.

Learn more →

Survival Analysis Projects

My work in survival analysis focuses on developing and applying innovative statistical methods to analyze time-to-event data in medical research.

Advanced Competing Risks Analysis

Developed new methodologies for handling competing risks in survival analysis, with applications to cancer research and cardiovascular outcomes.

  • Novel estimation procedures for subdistribution hazards
  • Software implementation in R and SAS
  • Applications in multi-center clinical trials

Joint Modeling of Longitudinal and Survival Data

Created statistical frameworks for simultaneously analyzing repeated measurements and time-to-event outcomes.

  • Dynamic prediction models for personalized medicine
  • Bayesian approaches to parameter estimation
  • Applications in HIV/AIDS and chronic disease research

Cardiology Research

Applying advanced biostatistical methods to improve prediction, diagnosis, and treatment in cardiovascular medicine.

Predictive Modeling for Cardiac Events

Developed machine learning algorithms to predict adverse cardiac events in high-risk patients, incorporating clinical, genetic, and imaging data.

  • Ensemble methods combining clinical expertise with ML algorithms
  • Validation across diverse patient populations
  • Implementation tools for clinical decision support

Meta-analysis of Cardiovascular Interventions

Conducted comprehensive systematic reviews and meta-analyses to evaluate the effectiveness of various interventions for cardiovascular diseases.

  • Network meta-analysis methods for multiple treatment comparisons
  • Assessment of publication bias and study heterogeneity
  • Guidelines for clinical practice based on evidence synthesis

Collaboration Opportunities

I'm always interested in collaborating on challenging biostatistics problems. If you have a research project that could benefit from advanced statistical expertise, please get in touch.
